DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find frequency I50L substitution among patient experience treatment failure atazanavir-containing regimen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Prevalence I50L Mutation When ATV Treated Patients Fail Regimen
DOC.criteria: Atazanavir contain antiretroviral regimen Confirmed virologic failure define either : 1 . HIV RNA PCR great equal 1000 copies/mL achieve value < 400 copies/mL least 2 consecutive measurement 2 . HIV RNA great equal 1000 copies/mL 24 week continuous therapy At least 18 year old Unable give inform consent Prisoners subject involuntarily incarcerate treatment psychiatric physical illness
